main.name: Asset
main.description: The main Asset constructor. The object returned by `Assets.get()` is an instance of this.

arguments.name: urls
arguments.description: The array of URLs of this asset.

arguments.name: mime
arguments.description: The mime type of this asset.

children.name: urls
children.description: The array of URLs of this asset.

children.name: mime
children.description: The mime type of the asset, based on the resource URL, not on the actual Content-Type header. Only available for images and text assets.

children.name: done
children.description: Whether this asset is done loading. This includes errors, so if the request for all the URLs fail, `error` will be `true`. If one or more requests load correctly, `error` will be `false`.

children.name: error
children.description: Whether this asset has encountered an error while loading.
